I would put a sign around my neck saying, "This is me, not you."
I would have to draw people around me.  I would say my name was the same as theirs and my middle initial would be the same as theirs and tell them the address I lived at.

I would put my name on everything I wear.  I would have my name on my underwear, socks, shirt and pants.  I would have an emblem or symbol to identify me that no one else would ever have that would be personal to me only.
I would keep my friends up late at night and tell them all my dirty secrets.
I would put big ugly letters on my head that would the name of the person who I wish I could be.
